data.title: University of Alabama at Birmingham Athletics
data.meta_description: Wally Adams (6) WR - AS A R-SENIOR (2017): Lone appearance/start came against UTEP (11/25)...Instrumental in helping recruit players to UAB during its two-ye...
data.text:
AS A R-SENIOR (2017):

Lone appearance/start came against UTEP (11/25)...Instrumental in helping recruit players to UAB during its two-year playing hiatus.

AS A R-JUNIOR (2014):

Had no stats

AS A R-SOPHOMORE (2013):

Ranked sixth in the team in receptions with 11… Had 145 receiving yards to average 13.2 yards per catch… Planked in 11-of-12 games and made one start (Northwestern State)… Had a season-best three receptions vs. FIU and Marshall… Season-High 40 receiving yards on two receptions against East Carolina… Had 33 receiving yards against the Thundering Herd… Rgistered a pair of catches for 31 yards in road contest at UTSA… Long reception for season was 29 yards against Florida Atlantic

AS A R-FRESHMAN (2012):

Saw limited action in three games (Troy, Southeastern Louisiana and Houston).

2011 AT UAB:

Redshirt

High School:

A three year started for head coach Dell McGee at Carver High School… Was tabbed a first-team all-city and all-region performer as a senior by the Columbus Ledger Enquier… also earned second-team all-city honors as a junior… A standout in the classroom, he carried a 3.5 GPA and earned a spot on the first-team all-state acadmic team… Was rated as the No. 104 cornerback in the country and No. 8 in the state of Georgia by ESPN.com… Also one of the top wide recerived in his region, he averaged 19.9 yards a catch (22/438) and grabbed five touchdowns during senior season… Helped lead team to a 13-1 record and a final ranking of No. 14 in the state of Georgia… Team captured 5-AA Region Championship
